heading: ***FROST ADVISORY TONIGHT THROUGH THE CHAMPLAIN BASIN AND HUDSON VALLEY***Today
text: Periods of clouds through the northern Green and White Mountains. Mostly sunny most elsewhere west and south. Continued blustery and chilly. Highs in the 40s to near 50 northeast, low to mid 50s southwest. North winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear, still a few evening clouds northeast. Lows in the 20s to low 30s. Winds north 10 to 15 mph, decreasing later at night.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny. Highs in the 50s. Winds north near 10 mph.
